document_data.mainbody:
Watchmens Way, which was also seen as Watchmans Way, was a small road that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Watchmens Way was located in the south section of Waterdeeps Castle Ward at the base of Castle Waterdeep. The road originated on Soothsayers Way where it branched northeast to terminate just east of Hillock Court. Both Soldiers Street and Crossbow Lane merged with Watchmens Way north of the Bell Tower.
